The reference therapy ( control arm ) use course trial combination arm everolimus plus exemestane . The investigational therapy context study everolimus monotherapy capecitabine monotherapy . All treatment take orally disease progression , intolerable toxicity withdrawal patient 's informed consent . Patients randomly assign equal allocation one treatment arm : 1 . Exemestane ( 25mg daily ) combination everolimus ( 10mg daily ) 2 . Everolimus ( 10mg daily ) 3 . Capecitabine ( 1250mg/m2 twice daily ) orally two week , follow one week rest period 3-weeks cycle .
